currentPost.title: Call Tracking: Proven Results
currentPost.excerpt: No matter the business or practice, an easy-to-contact phone number is a must. In order for a client to order [ More.. ]
currentPost.content:
No matter the business or practice, an easy-to-contact phone number is a must. In order for a client to order the product, contact customer service, inter-office communication, schedule an appointment, you need a phone number. For a professional medical practice, having a call tracking number helps with much more than just scheduling appointments. People are more likely to click call a tracking number online than email the professional.

More than just a means of tracking the number of calls

In a 2014 study by Google, the results show that 78 percent of consumers think the local address in an ad is important and 77 percent think displaying a phone number is important. Possible patients want to feel they are contacting a service that will not cheat them out of quality. If patients find it difficult to contact a practice, then they will be more inclined to seek services elsewhere. We can help professionals utilize what are known as “trust signals” such as a phone number, address, online reviews and more to help show patients that the practice is real and trustworthy. However, a medical professional may not enjoy the idea of having his or her personal phone as a main point of contact for patients. A call tracking number will be available for future patients and will help to track calls.

In the same Google study, 70 percent of participants prefer a call button on a website when using their smartphone.

It is important to listen to what consumers enjoy or find easiest to use in communication. Patients may seek a different practice than their current one if it is too difficult to contact. At Doctor Genius, we can help utilize call tracking and determine the most effective means of communication.

Using call tracking to help you

At Doctor Genius, we use call tracking to:
  • Track the number of calls a patient is getting
  • Help the professional differentiate between old and new clients before picking up the phone
  • Create effective tools such as a calling button on the website for easy-smartphone use access
We understand how to utilize computer, tablet and smartphone platforms to provide the proper view of a client’s website. In the same Google study, 70 percent of participants prefer a call button on a website when using their smartphone. At Doctor Genius, we can customize the call button and your website with the patient in mind. We will ensure the website is easy to navigate and has all of the mechanics to ensure the patient can directly contact the practice to schedule an appointment if necessary. We also offer our services in a variety of packages to provide potential clients with multiple options and services. We will spend the time to take all information into account before we determine which plan can most effectively bring in new patients.  If you are interested in Doctor Genius or have questions about our services, do not hesitate to call us at 877-477-2311.

Doctor Genius

At Doctor Genius, we work with clients to expand their private practice by helping them reach, engage and convert consumers into new patients. prevPost.title: Presenting a Practice: More Than Facts on Notecards
prevPost.excerpt: Most likely, everyone has given a presentation at one time or another in life. You put together the poster board [ More.. ]
prevPost.content:
Most likely, everyone has given a presentation at one time or another in life. You put together the poster board or create a PowerPoint, gather facts and statistics, and present it to people. When it comes to presenting information in a classroom or on a website, there is one main factor that can make or break a presentation: how one organizes and displays the content.

An ever-changing market

The 2017 State of Inbound report finds that the top challenge for 63 percent of marketers is generating traffic and leads. While anyone can make a post or write a blog, the correct quality content will make all the difference. In order to help a professional practice receive an increase of views on a website, the patient needs to have easy-to-access content on the site and ensure that it is the right information people need to find. In a 2015 study, Google finds that 65 percent of smartphone users search for the relevant information, no matter who is providing the information. With at-home products allowing people to utilize voice search instead of typing searches online, patients will use certain keywords or terms that may limit search results. With so many alternative methods for seeking a medical practice and a constantly changing digital market, medical professionals need to know how to navigate the digital market.  Medical professionals have the skills and knowledge to treat patients for a variety of conditions, but may not have the knowledge on how to present and market that skill. Fortunately, Doctor Genius knows how to present and organize content in an effective manner for better results.

Presenting material effectively

The 2017 State of Inbound report finds that the top challenge for 63 percent of marketers is generating traffic and leads.

A website with too much information will make it difficult for people to navigate a medical professional’s website. Patients are less likely to visit a website on any electronic device if it does not have:
  • Easy-to-access contact information
  • Helpful FAQ-like pages that summarize services in an easy-to-read manner
  • Clickable phone number link for smartphone users
  • Mobile responsive design
  • Reviews from other patients of the practice
  • Summary about the medical professionals that is not too complex
Doctor Genius has the ability to supply all of these website tools and more. We have the development and support teams on-site to help perfect a website. We also help you customize the website to your needs. We will help you present your service in an effective format that gives people an accurate representation of who you are as a medical professional. For more information on our services, give us a call at 877-477-2311. Our representatives are waiting to help you begin to build a better website today.

nextPost.title: Strong Support, Custom Content, Constant Communication
nextPost.excerpt: No one likes to remain on the phone, going through the hellish battle of hearing an automated voice repeat the [ More.. ]
nextPost.content:
No one likes to remain on the phone, going through the hellish battle of hearing an automated voice repeat the same ads between terrible elevator music for far too long. An independent consumer study from TalkTo found in 2013 that the average person spends about 13 hours per year or about 43 days on hold in a lifetime. Fortunately, the Support and Client Services team at Doctor Genius can offer the help that you need when you need it.

We’re here to help you

We not only supply support to clients, but we have a team of marketing specialists, support team members and sales representatives on standby to address any issues or answer any questions that you might have. We do not rely on an automated system to solve a client’s issue and will ensure that we find the solution for your needs. We throw away the annoying and challenging barriers that customers face when they have to speak with a machine or automated system to answer questions. In fact, American Express conducted a survey in 2011 which found that 67 percent of customers hung up out of frustration that they had to speak with a machine and not a real person. While our system will direct a caller to a specific department, we will be there to speak with the client as soon as we are able and solve their problem. We provide constant communication in order for you to get the most out of your website and our services. We also strive to offer quality content on a regular basis.

A high caliber of custom content

Our support team is also available to communicate with clients for any corrections or changes the client wants to make.

Along with our constant communication and strong support, we also provide clients with quality custom content for their website. We have a development team of specialists in-house who focus on creating quality content for your website that can address different types of medical practices. Our support team is also available to communicate with clients for any corrections or changes that you want to make. At Doctor Genius, we are here to help our professional medical clients:
  • Establish and maintain an active presence in the Digital Market
  • Utilize social media platforms and call tracking technology to bring in new clients
  • Optimizing custom content on a website
  • Helping the client operate an effective patient-retention system
  • Communicate and work with Google for website search results
After we complete a website, a member of our support team will speak with you over the phone to review your website. At this point in the process, you will be able to request changes before the website goes live. Even after, our team will be available to help with other issues or questions you have. If you are interested in our services or have any questions, give us a call at 877-477-2311.
